abstract.text: Value type representing SMPTE/EBU timecode.
Specify the SMPTE time at which the track is to start.
Returns valid range of values for a timecode component, given the current
and
Returns a set of invalid components, if any.
A fully valid timecode will return an empty set.
Validation relies on
and
Add a duration to the current timecode and return a new instance.
Multiply the current timecode by floating-point number and return a new instance.
Input values can be as large as desired and will be calculated recursively. ie: (0,0,0,1000) or (0,0,500,0)

Sample rate is expressed in Hz. (ie: 48KHz would be passed as 48000)
